idea-plugin.name: MavenManager
idea-plugin.description:
MavenManager is a IDEA plugin developed by the 58 Project Efficiency team. Manage dependencies of maven project to resolve jar conflicts.

Usage:
Pitch on pom.xml -> Right click -> MavenManager.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
1.1.0 Fix bug of NullPointerException when jar version is not number.
1.0.1 Initial plugin.
